Date.description: The date of the recorded share price

Open.description: The opening share price for the day (in USD)

High.description: The highest recorded share price for the day (in USD)

Low.description: The lowest recorded share price for the day (in USD)

Close.description: The closing share price for the day (in USD)

Adj Close.description: The adjusted closing share price for the day (in USD). This is the closing price after adjustments for all applicable splits and dividend distributions.

Volume.description: The number of shares traded during the day

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in stock market analysis.
